titleStmt.title: Corpus Parlamentari en català ParlaMint-ES-CT-en, 2022-07-20 3601.ana [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Catalan parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-ES-CT-en, 2022-07-20 3601.ana [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]

respStmt.resp: Data retrieval, first conversion to XML and to ParlaMint TEI
Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation

availability.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Parlament de Catalunya diaris de sessions de parlamentaries
Parliament of Catalonia daily sessions

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

div.head: Sessió 36.1
div.note: The session will open in the morning and two minutes. She chairs the President of the Parliament, accompanied by all the members of the Bureau, who is assisted by the President-in-Office of the Secretary-General, the late Mercè Arderiu and Usart and the late Antoni Bayona Rocamora.

The President of the Government, accompanied by the Vice-President and Councillor of Digital Policies and Territories, the Councillor of the Presidency, the Councillor of Enterprise and Labour, the Councillor of Economy and History, the Councillor of Equality and Feminisms, the Councillor of External Action and Government Obert, the Councillor of Education, the Councillor of Research and Universities, the Councillor of Health, the Councillor of Interior, the Councillor of Social Rights, the Councillor of Culture and the Councillor of Justice.
ORDER OF THE DAY OF THE CONVENTION
1. Tribute in memory of former deputy Antoni Dalmau and Ribalta (tram. 401-00021/13). Portaveus board. Substance.
Two. Ask with an oral answer.

Three. Decree-Law 10/2022 of 5 July 2018 amending Decree-Law 4/2018 of 17 July 2018, on which the direct management of the service of water supply to populations is assumed by means of the installations of the Ter-Llobregat network of general government ownership and the creation of the Ter-Llobregat water supply (tram. 203-00027/13). Government of the Generalitat. Debate and vote on the validation or repeal of the law decree.

4. Decree Law 9/2022 of 5 July of urgent measures in the matter of lloger of vehicles with driver (tram. 203-00026/13). Government of the Generalitat. Debate and vote on the validation or repeal of the law decree.

Five. Decree-Law 8/2022 of 12 July, which authorizes the Government to grant approval to Circuits de Catalunya, SL, and a guarantee before the financing of the guarantee, relating to the race promotion contract with Formula One World Championship Limited (FOWC), in order to guarantee the payment of contractual rights for the organization of the Grand Prix Formula 1 of the years 2023 to 2026 (prom. 203-00028/13). Government of the Generalitat. Debate and vote on the validation or repeal of the law decree.

Six. Proposal for a law amending Article 47 of Law 5/2008, of 24 April, of the right of women to eradicate male-based violence, concerning compensation and aid for women victims of male-based violence and their daughters and daughters (tram. 202-00027/13). Socialist Parliamentary Group and Units for Progress. Totality debate (text presented: BOPC 178, 19)

7. Designation of Members who are to defend before the Congress of Deputies the proposal of law guaranteeing the service of automatic cashier in municipalities at risk of financial exclusion and of guarantee in access to banking services (tram. 271-00001/13). Parliament plethora. Appointment of deputies.
Eight. Inquiries to the Government on expenditure on aid and subsidies and on institutional advertising in communication media (tr. 300-00212/13). VOX Parliamentary Group in Catalonia. Substance.
Nine. Question to the Government on the economic situation (tram. 300-00214/13). Socialist Parliamentary Group and Units for Progress. Substance.
Ten. Question to the Government about the economic situation caused by the crisis (tram. 300-00215/13). Parliamentary Group of May. Substance.

11. He asked the Government about the paralysis of the first political course of the 14th parliamentary term (tram. 300-00210/13). Parliamentary Group of the Popular Unity Candidate - A New Cycle for Guanyar. Substance.
12. Question to the Government about the use of language at school (tram. 300-00208/13). Parliamentary Group of Ciutadans. Substance.
13. He asked the Government about the impetus of language policy (tram. 300-00211/13). Parliamentary Group of Republican Esquerra. Substance.
14. Question to the Government about attacks on prison officials by internal authorities (tram. 300-00213/13). Socialist Parliamentary Group and Units for Progress. Substance.
15. Interview with the Government on the approval of the new social service programme contract (tram. 300-00209/13). Joint Parliamentary Group for Catalonia. Substance.
16. Motion following the Government's inquiry into digital policies (tram. 302-00177/13). Socialist Parliamentary Group and Units for Progress. Debate and vote.
17. Motion following the Government's inquiry into the strategy of the future for the eve of Alt Pirineu and Aran (tram. 302-00179/13). Parliamentary Group of May. Debate and vote.
18. Motion subsequent to the Government's inquiry into the AP-7 highway collapses (tram. 302-00180/13). Parliamentary Group of Ciutadans. Debate and vote.

19. Motion following the inquiry to the Government on the creation of a nuclear transition fund just with the territories owning Asco and Vandellòs (tram. 302-00178/13). Socialist Parliamentary Group and Units for Progress. Debate and vote.

Twenty. Motion subsequent to the Government's inquiry into the protection of the coastal environment (tram. 302-00184/13). Parliamentary Group of the Popular Unity Candidate - A New Cycle for Guanyar. Debate and vote.

Twenty-one. Motion subsequent to the Government's inquiry into the international political situation and the right to self-determination (tram. 302-00181/13). Joint Parliamentary Group for Catalonia. Debate and vote.

22. Motion subsequent to the Government's inquiry into the impact of repression on independence and democratic standards of the Spanish State (tram. 302-00182/13). Parliamentary Group of Republican Esquerra. Debate and vote.
23. Motion following the Government's inquiry into policies to curb the illegal occupation of habitats (tram. 302-00183/13). VOX Parliamentary Group in Catalonia. Debate and vote.
To the President

u.note: Manifestation of condolence and condemnation of male violence
Compliment of Motion 111/XII, on rescue operations in the Mediterranean and migration policies

div.note: Ignacio Martín Blanco
To the President
The session is suspended three quarters of the evening and fourteen minutes.
